characters.name: BOYD
characters.text: Hey, why don’t you come back when you’ve got some money to spend, dude?

characters.name: NEAL
characters.text: Is there any place around here a guy can have a decent conversation?

characters.name: ADAM
characters.text: Damn, I can’t even feel my face. Wait. No, no, I can’t even feel it.

characters.name: ALEX SMITH
characters.text: Do you believe in love at ﬁ rst sight? I do, ’cause I fell in love with whiskey when I ﬁ rst saw it.

characters.name: DAVID PAREDES
characters.text: What is this? Armed robbery? Mira, this is a donut shop, pendejo, not Fort Knox.

characters.name: GORD L
characters.text: Shit, my drink is f—king strong! This is going to be a good night.

characters.name: JACK
characters.text: Annabelle is our music supervisor. She claims to have the largest collection of new wave records this side of the Atlantic. Our patrons can’t seem to get enough of it.

characters.name: KELLY K.
characters.text: If more people don’t show up soon, I’m totally leaving.

characters.name: NATHAN
characters.text: Whoo! I knew the waiting line was going to be worth it. Hot mommies are everywhere!

characters.name: PIXIE D
characters.text: Do you like my hair? It’s just like Madonna’s.

characters.name: ROCKY T.
characters.text: You’ve got two choices. One: leave now, or two: leave with blood in your urine. Your f—king choice, buddy.

characters.name: ROSALIND
characters.text: Mmm. Yeah, I really dig a guy with a ponytail.

characters.name: SMOOTH
characters.text: Do you have any African in you, baby? No? Would you like some?

characters.name: YOLANDA SUMMERSET
characters.text: You get any lower you’ll be an honest working man again.

characters.name: SHEFFIELD
characters.text: And who would this have to do with? Not me, certainly, because I couldn’t give a shit less. Are you confusing me with the guy over there who might give a shit? Because I don’t.

characters.name: BRIGGS
characters.text: “What are you talking about? I don’t need no f—king blood money pufﬁ n’ out my wallet. Stop being a bitch, man.
characters.locale: Babylon Club (Tony’s return to Miami), Pay off Vice mission

characters.name: WESCOTT
characters.text: What the f—k makes you think I like donuts?
characters.locale: Babylon Club (Tony’s return to Miami), Pay off Vice mission

characters.name: MR. SMITH
characters.text: You are a dead man, Montana.

characters.name: STACEY
characters.text: Do you play any instruments? I used to play the trombone back at school.

characters.name: LIMEY
characters.text: The only guy that’d get a better deal from me is General George Custer, but he’s f—king dead.

characters.name: EDGAR MARTINEZ
characters.text: I said, maricón, you need walking lessons. What do you have? Balance problem?

characters.name: HEAVY P
characters.text: Is that a friendly gun or blow-your-motherf—kin’-brains-out gun like mine?

characters.name: JOHN JOHNSON
characters.text: You need to mind where you’re going before someone rips your ears off and mails them to your mama.

characters.name: CLARK
characters.text: I’ve told you our return policy already, and the fact this shit got puke on it, means no refund.

characters.name: THE CAPTAIN
characters.text: They had no problem sticking a pack of cigars up their asses. They had to stand up in the boat, but then one of them fell overboard.

characters.name: ALONSO
characters.text: He wants blue rare, I’ll give him blood on a plate.

characters.name: BO WHITEHEAD
characters.text: Man, this little money I’m making, man. School loans won’t be paid until I’m ﬁ fty, man!

characters.name: STEPHEN LEE
characters.text: I don’t know what that shit is, but you spread it on toast and it look just like mayonnaise.

characters.name: CARLA
characters.text: Nothing says ‘sexy’ like a greasy little guy with a chip on his shoulder.

characters.name: CASSANDRA
characters.text: I’d slap you, but I’d have to wash my hands for a week.

characters.name: DOUGLAS
characters.text: Welcome to the U.S. of A.

characters.name: HARRY
characters.text: Sir, please have your registration ready, or else we will conﬁ scate your pleasure craft

characters.name: COCO
characters.text: Because I make more college money than a Wall Street broker running this bar.

characters.name: KRISTIN
characters.text: Do I look like I want to eat f—king ice cream?

characters.name: PRECILLA
characters.text: Look out, dork! These shoes probably cost more than your car.

characters.name: SONYA
characters.text: You expect me to be impressed with that?

characters.name: TANYA
characters.text: You know, having a body like this brings a certain responsibility with it.

characters.name: LUIS
characters.text: I recommend SPF8 to build a base tan, then switch to 4.

characters.name: PENELOPE
characters.text: You need to have children before you can truly understand. Until then, I suggest you just keep to what you know.

characters.name: GINA
characters.locale: Dead in ofﬁ ce in opening mission

characters.name: CARLOS
characters.text: Get the f—k out of here. This is Tony Montana’s turf.
characters.locale: Delivers Tony’s car, patrols Tony’s mansion, and protects Tony’s fronts when purchased through exotics.

characters.name: JOSE
characters.text: I can see why the ladies love you, Tony
characters.locale: Delivers Tony’s car, patrols Tony’s mansion, and protects Tony’s fronts when purchased through exotics.

characters.name: NICK
characters.text: Hey, yo, you even look at Tony and I’m going to tear you a new asshole with this f—king gun, man.
characters.locale: Delivers Tony’s car, patrols Tony’s mansion, and protects Tony’s fronts when purchased through exotics.

characters.name: PEDRO
characters.text: You settle down, man. You know what happens when you lose your temper.”
characters.locale: Delivers Tony’s car, patrols Tony’s mansion, and protects Tony’s fronts when purchased through exotics.

characters.name: TINO
characters.text: Let me tell you something. You got a f—king problem with Tony that means you got a f—king problem with me. Okay?
characters.locale: Delivers Tony’s car, patrols Tony’s mansion, and protects Tony’s fronts when purchased through exotics.

characters.name: ALFONSO DIAZ
characters.text: Too bad Manny wasn’t here to help you out, eh Tony?

characters.name: EDGAR DIAZ
characters.text: Hey, look at me. Do I look like a f—king bitch to you, coño? No? Then don’t f—king treat me like one, OK?

characters.name: THE BOSS
characters.text: Nothing stinks worse than a container full of dead stowaways.

characters.name: ANDRE
characters.text: I swear to God, if it was up to me, the dude would be ﬁ red.

characters.name: CARTER
characters.text: Dan Marino? No, man, never heard of.

characters.name: HILLARY
characters.text: I need a coffee ASAP or I won’t stay awake through this marketing meeting.

characters.name: LAWRENCE
characters.text: They actually scratch the record.

characters.name: MARCUS
characters.text: What you talking about, six inches? Shit, it’s more like ten! Like a pole!

characters.name: MARIAN
characters.text: I did ﬁ fty sun-salutations this morning. Oooh! I’m so sore.

characters.name: NINA
characters.text: Some call me driven. I prefer the term focused.

characters.name: RUDY
characters.text: Yo, I can’t believe what’s happening in the market these days. Things isn’t going well. It’s deﬁ nitely going to collapse. You’ll see.

characters.name: STEVE PRATT
characters.text: I think I’m really close to this raise. I got to get this dough. I can feel it.

characters.name: WANDA
characters.text: I swear, if he makes one more comment about my ‘assets’ I will call his wife myself.

characters.name: WILLIAM
characters.text: So damn hot out here I could just kill a man

characters.name: XAVIER
characters.text: Tony, is business as slow for you as it is for me?

characters.name: MACKINTOSH
characters.text: That’s what I love about this country, everybody’s packing.

characters.name: TYLER
characters.text: Hey, there’s only room for one freak here, and that’s me.

characters.name: LEROY
characters.text: A dead man with twenty kilos of white powder tied up to him. Caught him in me nets, you know, man.

characters.name: RANDY
characters.text: I better be getting paid for this!

characters.name: CHUCK
characters.text: I got to get laid after the day I’ve had

characters.name: JONAS
characters.text: It’s over, papi.

characters.name: MARIBELLE
characters.text: Come on! Fight like a man, you maricón!
characters.locale: End of Nacho’s Tanker mission and Deliver mission

characters.name: HERVÉ
characters.text: If you were an insect, I’d pull your legs off. Maybe I will anyway.

characters.name: ARNOLD
characters.text: I tell you, man, if it wasn’t for hate, I’d feel nothing.

characters.name: BABY FACE
characters.text: Cocaine is currency, man. It’s stronger than a Yankee dollar.

characters.name: BOB
characters.text: I got to ﬁ nd a better hiding spot for my stash, man. My f—kin’ dog got into it

characters.name: BRET CAGNEY
characters.text: You see the ring girl last night? I tell you, I get me some of that, she better be ready for more than ten rounds.

characters.name: BUNNY
characters.text: I’ll be stoned right good, about an hour from now, man

characters.name: CARLOS DELGADO
characters.text: Ese, you creepingb toward the edge, man.

characters.name: DELROY
characters.text: My guess is once you scoop the shit out of your pants, you weigh about ninety-nine pounds.

characters.name: DONOVAN
characters.text: I got a whole new idea for cockﬁ ghting, but nobody gonna take me up on it.

characters.name: EUGENE
characters.text: F—k me, I got to smarten up, this is ridiculous.

characters.name: FRANKLIN
characters.text: That’s the best you f—king got?

characters.name: FREDDY Y.
characters.text: Never come around here without a friend, you know what I mean?

characters.name: GEORGE
characters.text: I left New York for this?

characters.name: GREGORIO
characters.text: How far do you think I can throw a knife? Run and let’s ﬁ nd out.

characters.name: IBRAHIM
characters.text: What’s wrong with you boy? Didn’t your daddy teach you any damn manners?

characters.name: JEROME
characters.text: You scared now?

characters.name: JORGE
characters.text: Te digo una cosa. When this job is done, I’m going to make love to a bottle of tequila.

characters.name: JOSE
characters.text: They ought to give us a f—king medal for what we do for the economy.

characters.name: JUAN
characters.text: At night on the water, I sing to the mermaids.

characters.name: JULIO
characters.text: Your whole family came from a pig?

characters.name: KOOL K
characters.text: I bet you got a problem with perros pissing on you all the time.

characters.name: LELAND
characters.text: Smart people know when to shut up. Notice he’s still talking?

characters.name: LENNOX
characters.text: F—k everyone who isn’t one of us.

characters.name: LI’L ZE
characters.text: Chicks really dig football players, y’know what I’m sayin’? I think it’s in their genes. Either that or it’s the money

characters.name: PADDY
characters.text: This city has too much neon. It’s like a high-class whore in clown make-up.

characters.name: PECKER
characters.text: I think I hear your mama calling you. Maybe you’re late for dinner, baby boy. Get the f—k out of here!

characters.name: PEDRO
characters.text: Hey, papito! These are new shoes. Are you stupid? Are you high?

characters.name: PEPE
characters.text: You know, people these days don’t have enough respect for a good, thick mustache.

characters.name: PERCY
characters.text: Imagine a mountain made of all the coke in the world and me on top of it.

characters.name: PRESCOT
characters.text: You got six seconds to get out of here, and I just used ﬁ ve of them up telling you that.

characters.name: ROCKWELL
characters.text: Some cracker said, ‘Don’t count your chickens before they hatched.’ What I want to know is, what kind of fool-ass motherf—ker got the time to be walking around counting chickens?

characters.name: RUPERT
characters.text: I been thinking way too much, man. My dreads hurt.

characters.name: RYANA
characters.text: Did someone take a shit and dress it up?

characters.name: TINY T.
characters.text: The American war on drugs has been damn good for business.

characters.name: TITO
characters.text: Life is like a poker game. Never show your hand.

characters.name: VINCE
characters.text: Listen, no one gives a rat’s ass what you have to say, man, OK?

characters.name: WILTON
characters.text: Ah, yah. Who’s the pimp daddy now, baby?

characters.name: DEAN
characters.text: You ever see that band live? I tell you what, that guy is from another freakin’ planet, man. The planet Rock. Straight up.

characters.name: ALEJANDRO SOSA
characters.text: I want to clear something up with you, Tony, before I kill you. When you move 400 kilos a month, it’s imperative that you do kill children. That way heroes don’t get confused and go on ‘60 Minutes.’ They instead crawl back into the hole they came from.

characters.name: ARTURO
characters.text: I’m telling you, pay attention. ¿Me entiendes? Sosa will kick your ass if you don’t.

characters.name: EDUARDO
characters.text: You think these pants show off my package? I want the chicks to notice my package, ‘cause I’m packin’ something serious down here.

characters.name: GABRIEL
characters.text: Hey, I don’t know what you’re looking for, asshole, but you’re looking in the wrong f—king place.

characters.name: GASPAR GOMEZ
characters.text: Say hello to your sister for me, Montana!

characters.name: GONZALO
characters.text: It could be worse, we could be shoving this shit up our ass.

characters.name: HERNÁN
characters.text: Look! You’re hassling the wrong guy and you’re the only one here who doesn’t know it.

characters.name: MANNY
characters.text: F—king leave or I will cut off your nose and shove it up your f—king ass.

characters.name: MARIANO
characters.text: That’s some f—king f—ked up shit, you f—ker!

characters.name: RAZA
characters.text: Go leave skid marks on someone else’s upholstery.

characters.name: SIMÓN
characters.text: Who the f—k is this Montana guy, anyway?

characters.name: TAMAYO
characters.text: I almost don’t carry that much money. Almost.

characters.name: PABLO
characters.text: Oye, Mr. Montana, we think we may know where you wife is…Elvira.

characters.name: TRAVIS
characters.text: We got eighty rooms in this place and every one of ‘em has a toilet. In some countries they call that a palace.

characters.name: RICARDO
characters.text: Who am I? I work for Mr. Gomez. I handle his security.

characters.name: GORDO
characters.text: Do I have to hurt my back and beat your ass?

characters.name: KENT
characters.text: Remember to wake your ass up and be here by 8:00 a.m. tomorrow. And you better not be late!

characters.name: LANDON
characters.text: Where’s the union?

characters.name: MARIA
characters.text: Ah, you know how it is; the sun goes up, the sun comes down. Same shit, different day.

characters.name: MARLON
characters.text: Is this another gang bust?

characters.name: RYAN BURMEISTER
characters.text: You better hurry up! Those crates aren’t going to move themselves, you know.

characters.name: SANCHO RABAL
characters.text: This country don’t exactly have its arms open for a hug, you know, man?

characters.name: TORSTEN
characters.text: I can’t wait for this weekend! You ever felt that way?

characters.name: WESLEY
characters.text: I’ve been busting my ass all week.

characters.name: MAURICE
characters.text: Anything you need, man. Petrol, armaments, electronics.

characters.name: GRACE
characters.text: Me would love to go to bed with a guy who wasn’t actually in love with ganja, you know?

characters.name: JERRY
characters.text: Tony, do I have to remind you that guns aren’t a good thing to be carrying around in a bank?

characters.name: MADGE
characters.text: Going to get my own self to Amsterdam sometime soon.

characters.name: NAOMI
characters.text: Well, occasionally, you know, a man comes in handy for a night.

characters.name: RENÉE
characters.text: I think you’re not relaxed enough for around here, man.

characters.name: SILVA
characters.text: Your skin going to make a nice purse for my woman, eh?

characters.name: ARNALDO
characters.text: You should just keep your mouth shut. That way people won’t think you’re such a shithead.

characters.name: CAROLINA CORDOVA
characters.text: I told him, you want to be treated well, you got to treat me better.

characters.name: DOLORES ALVAREZ
characters.text: I don’t have to go to exercise class. I shake my ass every night in the club.

characters.name: JULIA HUERTA
characters.text: You have to balance out the young, beautiful men and the old, rich ones.

characters.name: LUIS CRUZ
characters.text: You think you’re packing? You want me to show you mine?

characters.name: MANUEL LOPEZ
characters.text: When my brother ﬁnds out about this he’s going to hunt you down and knock you the f—k out.

characters.name: MARCOS
characters.text: You ever seen my sister? Damn, she could deﬁ nitely lose some weight. I keep telling her.

characters.name: VICTOR MONTOYA
characters.text: You should have seen this white guy, he ate the worm! He was so f—ked up we didn’t even have to rob him, he just gave us his all of his stuff!

characters.name: EUNICH
characters.text: Super crispy, fat, and juicy!

characters.name: AGENT SANDERSON
characters.text: Man, I’m on a schedule! Now I got to squeeze your ass-kicking in between my appointments.

characters.name: BILL T. TAGWORTHY
characters.text: Don’t provoke my sense of self-preservation, brother!
characters.locale: Little Havana (rare), Downtown (nights and rare), North Beach (rare)

characters.name: FREDRICK
characters.text: Don’t mistake this suit and tie for something soft.
characters.locale: Little Havana (rare), Downtown (nights and rare), North Beach (rare)

characters.name: MR. STEINWORTH
characters.text: This is an outrage. I have my rights.
characters.locale: Little Havana (rare), Downtown (nights and rare), North Beach (rare)

characters.name: LEO JR.
characters.text: You pull this thing outta the swamp? The electrical is shot to shit.

characters.name: PEARL
characters.text: I stayed up late to hear my son come in. Ay, pero I am so tired.

characters.name: QUINTIN OSALIS
characters.text: You have to learn to respect women.
